uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

port_id_subtype.description: The type of port identifier encoding used in the 'port_id' field. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocPortIdSubtype, lldpRemPortIdSubtype)

port_id.description: The string value used to identify the port component associated with the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocPortId, lldpRemPortId)

port_description.description: The string value used to identify the 802 LAN station's port description associated with the local system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocPortDesc, lldpRemPortDesc)
